creator: nataliew@stanford.edu
text:
We have to retrieve the userid of the remote user when the user logs on. But
request.getRemoteUser() is returning null in Tomcat 6.0.14. Authentication is done
through LDAP. java.security.Principal pr = request.getUserPrincipal(); return
null to in tomcat 6.0.14

It works fine in Tomcat 5.X and 4.X.

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
This looks like a configuration error. Please continue with your thread on the
users list and confirm there is actually a bug. If there is, please re-open this
issue and include the simplest test case that illustrates the issue.
